190.sentence: while light , it will not easily go in small handbags or pockets .

191.sentence: the function lever - the one which switches between capture and view mode feels fragile .

192.sentence: flash - as with all built-in flashes in small cameras , you get overilluminated main subjects with depth being lost .

193.sentence: the strap is horrible and gets in the way of parts of the camera you need access to .

194.sentence: the functionality on this camera is mind-blowing .

195.sentence: canon have packed a lot in here and the options and controls are easy to use and logically laid out .

196.sentence: learning how to use it will not take very long .

198.sentence: range of functions - as indicated above - it has something for everyone : point and shoot power plus advanced functions for those who are serious about photography .

199.sentence: this is by far the finest camera in its price and category i have ever used .

200.sentence: the macro works great for medical photographs and the auto mode is terrific for point and shoot .

201.sentence: this camera is closest to perfect than any other digicam that is 4-5 megapixel .

202.sentence: i 'm glad canon decided to keep the 4mp resolution and improved upon it with new technology ;

203.sentence: yes there is a corner lens barrel distortion ( i do n't like it too but no harm done since i always use the camea lcd screen to see exactly what i 'm going to get ) in the viewfinder when you do n't zoom ( when you zoom the lens distortion goes away ) , canon knows this and engineered it that way to minimize the parallax phenomenon ; that is what lmost exactly ot the picture .

204.sentence: in terms of the shots taken , this camera is insanely great !

205.sentence: the pictures are fabulous and their is a ( short ) learning curve to it ; there are tons of features i have n't even gotten to .

206.sentence: i 've been pleased with the picture quality and durability in snow , car , boat and wind .

207.sentence: the camera 's a work of art / science -- that 's understood .

208.sentence: it takes great pictures , operates quickly , and feels solid .

209.sentence: to address two previous somewhat negative reviews : ( 1 ) yes , the lens barrel does obstruct part of the lower left corner in the lens viewfinder ; however , the lcd viewfinder is rather stunning and i find myself rarely using the lens viewfinder .

210.sentence: this camera has a major design flaw .

211.sentence: when you look through the viewfinder ( not the lcd ) the bottom left corner of the picture ( about 15 % ) is blocked by the lens .

212.sentence: everything else about the camera is great .

213.sentence: if you strictly use the lcd and not the view finder , i highly recommend the camera .

214.sentence: and so far , i 've been very pleased .
